name: QrPngLogoOptions
summary: Options and pixel data for a centered logo overlay in a QR PNG.

methods.name: #ctor
methods.summary: Creates a logo option with a packed RGBA buffer.

methods.name: FromPixels
methods.summary: Creates a logo option from a raw pixel buffer in BGRA/RGBA.

methods.name: FromPng
methods.summary: Creates a logo option from a PNG (RGBA or RGB, non-interlaced).

methods.name: FromPngFile
methods.summary: Creates a logo option from a PNG file.

properties.name: Rgba
properties.summary: Logo pixels in RGBA order, row-major, tightly packed.

properties.name: Scale
properties.summary: Maximum logo size relative to the QR area (excluding quiet zone).

properties.name: PaddingPx
properties.summary: Padding in pixels around the logo (filled with when is true).

properties.name: DrawBackground
properties.summary: Whether to draw a background plate behind the logo.

properties.name: Background
properties.summary: Background color for the logo plate.

properties.name: CornerRadiusPx
properties.summary: Optional corner radius for the background plate.
